translation.en: I can feel it Coming in the air tonight
Just when you think it's all over,
translation.es: Cuando crees que todo ha terminado,

translation.en: something unspeakable comes after you and your family,
translation.es: algo indescriptible va tras de ti y tu familia,

translation.en: murders your sister Jenny in cold blood,
translation.es: asesina a tu hermana Jenny a sangre fría

translation.en: and disappears into thin air.
But a clue left behind leads us here,
translation.es: Pero una pista nos trajo aquí,

translation.en: to this club in Bangkok.
And that's why we still need the Wu Assassin.
translation.es: Y, por eso, aún necesitamos al asesino del Wu.

translation.en: What's a Wu Assassin?
All right. So about a year ago,
translation.es: Bueno, hace cosa de un año,

translation.en: my friends and I were living it up in San Francisco.
translation.es: mis amigos y yo vivíamos en grande en San Francisco.

translation.en: Uh, my sister, Jenny, and I, we ran this restaurant,
translation.es: Mi hermana Jenny y yo dirigíamos un restaurante

translation.en: and, um, my boy Lu Xin, he ran cars,
translation.es: y mi amigo Lu Xin vendía autos

translation.en: until she showed up.
A 10,000- year- old warrior spirit brought back to Earth.
translation.es: un espíritu guerrero de 10 000 años que regresó a la Tierra.

translation.en: And then she gave her powers to Kai, my best friend.
translation.es: Le dio sus poderes a Kai, mi mejor amigo.

translation.en: And then he became the last Wu Assassin. Whatever.
translation.es: Él se volvió el último asesino del Wu.

translation.en: What, like The Avengers?
- Yeah. - Hmm. - But Asian. - Hmm.
Actually, no. More like that show from the '70s.
translation.es: En realidad, no. Más bien como el programa de los 70.

translation.en: Kai and Lu Xin are the Angels.
translation.es: Kai y Lu Xin son los ángeles.

translation.en: I'm like Charlie.
So what kind of mission?
Um, it's a supernatural one.
Sounds dangerous.
It's what we do.
- You seeing this? - You know why we're here.
So your friend Kai…
- What about him? - This Wu Assassin.
He's got to have some kind of powers, right?
He's empowered by this thing called the Dao.
He's faster and stronger than any man. He calls himself Death's Instrument.
translation.es: Es más rápido y fuerte que cualquiera. Se llama Instrumento de la muerte.

translation.en: And your other friend?
Oh no, he's just really good at kicking ass.
translation.es: No, él solo es genial dando golpizas.

translation.en: So why aren't you with them?
This seems more dangerous.
Do you want to continue your story somewhere else?
Hell, yeah.
What about your friends?
They'll be fine.
I think.
I fucking love Thailand.
Why Bangkok? I mean, what's here?
Answers.
I, uh, traced this material back to Thailand.
It's from an ancient, old piece of stone.
translation.es: Proviene de una piedra muy antigua.

translation.en: Kai! Up there! He's turning them.
Jiangshi.
Chi vampire.
- What's so special about this? -
I found it in my dead sister's hand.
translation.es: Mi hermana muerta lo tenía en la mano.

translation.en: Kai, Lu Xin, and I came back to my family restaurant,
translation.es: Kai, Lu Xin y yo regresamos al restaurante de mi familia

translation.en: and she was just there, dead on the ground.
translation.es: y ella estaba ahí, muerta en el piso.

translation.en: Well, here's to your sister.
You want to know a secret?
Sure.
Come here.
I don't drink anymore.
This will turn you into a Jiangshi, won't it?
I just want to talk.
Your powers don't work on me.
Who killed Jenny?
Who killed my sister?
- Kai! -
- He's not talking! - Ah!
Assassin's strike.
That's not what I was thinking at all.
translation.es: Eso no es lo que pensaba hacer.

translation.en: Yo. Hey, hey! What is this? Yo! Press the start button, man.
This isn't me.
It's me. I need your help.
You? Who are you?
No, I'm speaking through them.
I can't hold it for long.
It's not safe to put myself out here like this.
translation.es: No es seguro que me manifieste así.

translation.en: What do you want?
Not here.
8:00 a.m. Silom Temple archaeological dig site.
translation.es: A las 8, en la excavación arqueológica del Templo Silom.

translation.en: We have much to discuss, Wu Assassin.
translation.es: Tenemos mucho que discutir, asesino del Wu.

translation.en: I am never coming to a club with you ever again.
translation.es: Nunca iré a otra discoteca contigo.

translation.en: - Who was that? - We should call Tommy.
Stop the van!
Yeah. She didn't know anything.
What about your Jiangshi?
I guess we finally have a lead.
The archaeological site is owned by this biotech billionaire.
translation.es: La excavación arqueológica es de un biotecnólogo millonario.

translation.en: Not much else on him, but he owns that building.
translation.es: No hay información sobre él, pero es dueño del edificio.

translation.en: So, uh, we're just going to roll onto his turf?
If it gets us closer to Jenny's killer, that's all that matters.
translation.es: Puede que nos acerque al asesino de Jenny.

translation.en: Looks shady as fuck.
It should be up on the right.
Guessing he's not the valet.
Since founding his firm in 1999,
translation.es: Desde que fundó su empresa en 1999,

translation.en: William Pan has formed collaboration agreements with the world's largest companies.
translation.es: William Pam ha forjado acuerdos con las empresas más grandes del mundo,

translation.en: Providing scientists the opportunity and resources
translation.es: para darles a los científicos oportunidades y recursos

translation.en: to tackle humankind's most perplexing problems.
translation.es: para resolver los problemas más desconcertantes de la humanidad

translation.en: All in service of William's unique vision.
translation.es: en servicio de la singular visión de William.

translation.en: One people,
one world,
one planet.
We're not just looking to the future…
translation.es: No solo miramos hacia el futuro.

translation.en: we're looking to shape it.
Thank you for coming.
I know my message was unorthodox.
translation.es: Sé que mi mensaje fue poco ortodoxo.

translation.en: I apologize for not meeting you in person. Communicating like that was difficult.
translation.es: Me disculpo por no ir a verlos en persona. Comunicarse así es muy difícil.

translation.en: Dr. William Pan.
Do you know the story of Pan Gu?
Yeah, we do.
The first man to shape the universe from the great nothingness
translation.es: El primer hombre, que creó el universo de la nada,

translation.en: and made the heavens, the Earth, and the seas.
translation.es: junto al cielo, la tierra y el mar.

translation.en: We all went to Chinese school.
Chinese school didn't teach you what happened to Pan Gu
translation.es: No enseñan lo que le pasó a Pan Gu

translation.en: after he became a god.
He went mad with power.
Threatened to remake the world in his own image.
translation.es: Quiso rehacer el mundo a su imagen.

translation.en: But the Dao,
in its infinite celestial wisdom,
called upon the first Wu Assassin to strike down that first man.
translation.es: convocó al primer asesino del Wu para doblegar al primer hombre.

translation.en: Yin and yang. Chaos and order.
translation.es: Yin y yang. Caos y orden.

translation.en: These spirits have clashed for millennia.
translation.es: Estos espíritus llevan milenios de oposición.

translation.en: I'm not the first vessel.
But thanks to you, I am the last.
translation.es: Pero, gracias a ti, soy el último.

translation.en: And with the world left unbalanced,
chaos and I can finally complete our unending war.
translation.es: el caos y yo podremos terminar nuestra guerra sin fin.

translation.en: I was attacked.
Barely made it out alive.
And that's why I've retreated here for safety,
while my twin continues to spread chaos.
translation.es: mientras mi opuesto sigue desparramando el caos.

translation.en: Who is he?
She.
Yin and yang.
You might have heard of her. Ku An Qi.
translation.es: Tal vez la conozcan. Ku An Qi.

translation.en: Queen of the Bangkok underworld.
translation.es: La reina del bajo mundo de Bangkok.

translation.en: She's going global. Taking out any threats to her.
translation.es: Se globalizará. Destruirá a quienes la amenazan.

translation.en: Consuming Chi to build her power.
translation.es: Consumirá qí para aumentar su poder.

translation.en: The Shaolin in China. The Druids in Ireland.
translation.es: Los shaolines en China. Los druidas en Irlanda.

translation.en: And last month, she went to San Francisco.
translation.es: Y, el mes pasado, estuvo en San Francisco.

translation.en: Ku An Qi was looking for you,
translation.es: Ku An Qi te estaba buscando.

translation.en: but your friend intervened.
Jenny.
She fought valiantly.
But Ku cannot be stopped.
She will continue her rampage if left unchecked.
translation.es: Continuará con su masacre si no la controlo.

translation.en: How do you know all this?
Because Ku and I are connected.
translation.es: Porque Ku y yo estamos conectados.

translation.en: That is why I must be careful.
If I open myself up to her, she will come.
translation.es: Si me abro a ella, vendrá.

translation.en: Follow me.
This whole thing could be bullshit.
In the fight, your sister took something of Ku's, a talisman.
translation.es: En la pelea, tu hermana le quitó algo a Ku. Un talismán.

translation.en: I have the other half.
I assume you have hers.
What's it matter to you?
It's a piece of our Essence.
- She'll try to get it back. - Good. Send her my way.
In two days' time, my worse half
translation.es: En dos días, ella verá a los líderes de las cinco Tríadas

translation.en: is meeting the heads of the Five Triads at the Vie Hotel,
translation.es: En dos días, ella verá a los líderes de las cinco Tríadas en el hotel Vie, y así cimentará su poder.

translation.en: solidifying her power base.
translation.es: en el hotel Vie, y así cimentará su poder.

translation.en: Cameras everywhere, no weapons allowed.
translation.es: Habrá cámaras por todas partes, no se permiten armas.

translation.en: - There's no honor in guns. - And won't she know what you're up to?
translation.es: - No son honorables. - ¿No sabrá qué planeas?

translation.en: I'm doing my best to shield my thoughts from her.
My powers extend to the mind,
translation.es: Yo tengo poderes sobre la mente

translation.en: while hers are focused on the body.
translation.es: y ella los tiene sobre el cuerpo.

translation.en: A kidnapping mission in broad daylight.
translation.es: Una misión de secuestro a pleno día.

translation.en: Hotel security,
the five bosses of the Triads, their whole crews.
translation.es: los cinco líderes de las Tríadas y todos sus empleados.

translation.en: You know what?
I got a better idea.
translation.es: Tengo una mejor idea. ¿Por qué no usas tu poder mental

translation.en: Why don't you do the mind control thing and send an army after them?
translation.es: Tengo una mejor idea. ¿Por qué no usas tu poder mental y envías un ejército a atacarla?

translation.en: I can't control an army.
I can reach out, communicate, hold a thought for a minute.
translation.es: Puedo comunicarme con alguien por un momento.

translation.en: - - But that is the extent of my powers now.
translation.es: Pero es todo lo que puedo hacer.

translation.en: Well, it seems like you got all the answers, but the answers.
translation.es: Parece que tienes todas las respuestas menos las que necesitamos.

translation.en: We're in.
When you subdue Ku, you bring her to me with the talisman,
translation.es: Cuando reduzcan a Ku, tráiganmela con el talismán

translation.en: and I'll take care of the rest.
translation.es: y yo me encargaré de todo.

translation.en: No. You said the Dao is broken.
translation.es: No. Dijiste que el Dao se rompió.

translation.en: Yes.
But you and I together, maybe we can restore it.
translation.es: Pero tú y yo, juntos, tal vez podamos restaurarlo.

translation.en: Or we let it be broken.
And I kill her.
The hotel, it's a death trap.
translation.es: El hotel es una trampa mortal.

translation.en: Yeah, but it's the person, demigod, whatever, who murdered Jenny.
translation.es: Sí, pero es la persona, semidiosa o lo que sea, que mató a Jenny.

translation.en: Yes, I understand that, which is why we need to be smart about it.
translation.es: Lo sé, por eso debemos proceder con inteligencia.

translation.en: - Look at the pieces in front of us. - This isn't a game.
translation.es: - Examinar las piezas. - No es un juego.

translation.en: Actually, it is a game. Everything is a game, Tommy.
translation.es: Sí lo es. Todo es un juego, Tommy.

translation.en: We have the perfect opportunity right now. We should take advantage of it.
translation.es: Tenemos la oportunidad perfecta y hay que aprovecharla.

translation.en: If you have a death wish because of your sister, don't drag me--
translation.es: Si quieres morir por esto, no nos arrastres…

translation.en: You act like you don't care about Jenny at all!
- That's the game. No one's safe. - Ah, fuck you, man.
translation.es: - Nadie está a salvo, Tommy. - Vete a la mierda.

translation.en: - Yeah, fuck you too. - Guys! Calm down.
I'm calm!
Ku An Qi wants the Wu Assassin. I'll give her the Wu Assassin. Myself.
translation.es: Ku An Qi quiere al asesino del Wu. Yo mismo se lo entregaré.

translation.en: We're going together.
- No. - It might not be the smartest choice,
translation.es: - No. - No será lo más inteligente,

translation.en: but, look, this is the only opportunity we have.
Fuck that. No way. I'll do this one alone.
translation.es: Claro que no. Lo haré solo, carajo.

translation.en: You know what your problem is, Kai?
You think because you have powers, you're better than us.
translation.es: Te crees mejor que nosotros porque tienes poderes.

translation.en: Like we're just some kind of fucking burden.
translation.es: Como si fuéramos una carga para ti.

translation.en: Lu Xin is calling his contact.
translation.es: Lu Xin está llamando a su contacto.

translation.en: Can he get a rocket launcher to take Ku down?
translation.es: ¿Conseguirá un misil para tirarle a Ku?

translation.en: You never know, with magic.
translation.es: Quizá sirve para ganarle a su magia.

translation.en: But I guess this worked.
Let me show you something.
Keep this finger loose. It'll make it easier.
translation.es: Mantén este dedo relajado. Así te será más fácil.

translation.en: Try that.
I'm coming. I don't care what you say.
translation.es: Iré. No importa lo que digas.

translation.en: I have to go. Okay?
Look, Tommy.
You go angry, you get yourself killed.
translation.es: Si vas enojado, harás que te maten.

translation.en: That's… that's not how you fight.
You got to understand, though, man.
It's the only thing I have.
translation.es: Es lo único que me queda.

translation.en: Anger.
Sorry to break up the tanning session, boys.
Bad news.  The dude who outfitted us for the Jiangshi mission blocked me.
translation.es: Malas noticias. Quien nos aprovisionó para la misión del Jiangshi me bloqueó.

translation.en: Too much heat at the club.
Anyone else?
I mean, as soon as they hear we're going after Ku An Qi,
translation.es: Apenas oyen que iremos por Ku An Qi,

translation.en: they lose my number fast.
I might know someone crazy enough to help.
What? Since when did you get a Bangkok hookup?
I said might. I'll hit her up.
Something just doesn't feel right about this.
translation.es: Siento como si algo no estuviera bien.

translation.en: Something smells good.
- Whoa,. - Thank you so much.
What's Preeya look like anyway?
Like that.
Hey! How are you?
- Hey! - It's been a long time. What's happen--
Now we've got that over with.
translation.es: Ya nos sacamos eso de encima.

translation.en: What's up, Thomas?
Uh, first, why are we meeting here?
Oh, you know, support the local economy.
translation.es: Para apoyar a la economía local.

translation.en: Plus, it's out in the open. Can't be
too careful these days.
translation.es: Hay que tener cuidado estos días.

translation.en: You, I know.
Them…
- - …don't know.
Oh shit.
Where are we going?
Ah, too many questions.
You know who I work for?
Interpol, police of the world.
We know your Triad is meeting with Ku An Qi, a known terrorist.
translation.es: Sabemos que tu Tríada se reunirá con Ku An Qi, una terrorista.

translation.en: When?
And where?
Good luck.
That means, fuck off.
translation.es: Dice que se vayan a cagar.

translation.en: Both of you.
You wanna have fun?
The Vie Hotel, tomorrow.
You might wanna call in the cleaners.
translation.es: Tendrás que llamar a los de limpieza.

translation.en: I thought he gave you the information.
translation.es: Creí que te había dado la información.

translation.en: The actual cleaners. He soiled himself.
translation.es: Tendrán que limpiarlo de verdad. Se hizo encima.

translation.en: Uh, Preeya, meet the boys.
Boys, this is, uh, Preeya.
'Sup. Lu Xin.
- Lu, is that a Sin or a Xin? - Is that supposed to be a funny joke?
translation.es: - Lu, ¿dijiste Jean o Xin? - ¿Te burlas de mí?

translation.en: - What's his problem? - Don't worry. He's cool.
Uh, this is my man, Kai.
- Hello. - Hello.
See? Someone's got manners.
- Where's your sister? - Oh, she's not here.
That's too bad. I love Jen.
Anywho. Hear you boys are on a suicide mission.
translation.es: Bueno, me enteré de que tienen una misión suicida.

translation.en: What the fuck, Thomas. You told her?
It's the only way she'd help. I have to tell her everything.
translation.es: Solo así ayudará. Le conté todo. Me gusta saber en qué me estoy metiendo.

translation.en: Yeah, I like to know what I'm getting into.
translation.es: Me gusta saber en qué me estoy metiendo.

translation.en: Due diligence.
If you know, then why are you helping?
translation.es: Si sabes todo, ¿por qué nos ayudas?

translation.en: I don't mind a little action. It's part of the territory.
translation.es: Me gusta la acción. Son los gajes del oficio.

translation.en: This woman you're dealing with, serious shit. Lots of people dying.
translation.es: Esa mujer que buscan es peligrosa. Mucha gente ha muerto.

translation.en: She needs to be stopped.
Can you get this?
Let me make some calls.
Enjoy your shopping, boys.
Keep your mouth shut.
Shopping?
The fuck?
- Thank you. -
- Tommy? - Yeah.
How do you know her again?
So I was actually here five years ago, and someone stole my Louis V backpack.
translation.es: Vine hace cinco años, y alguien me robó mi bolso Vuitton.

translation.en: They took my wallet, passport, phone, everything.
So I went to the cops to report it, and, uh, the cops didn't do anything.
translation.es: Hice la denuncia, pero la policía no hizo nada.

translation.en: - So, someone told me to go talk to-- - Uh.
translation.es: Alguien me dijo que hablara con Pree…

translation.en: I'm just gonna make this story short and sweet, in case we ever have to hear it again, okay?
translation.es: Voy a resumir esta historia por si tenemos que volver a oírla.

translation.en: He got his shit jacked, and he doesn't know anything about her.
translation.es: Le robaron sus mierdas, y no sabe nada de ella.

translation.en: Okay, guys. Look, she's our only hookup.
translation.es: Es nuestro único contacto. La necesitamos.

translation.en: - We need this. - And beggars can't be choosers.
translation.es: Es nuestro único contacto. La necesitamos. Y a buen hambre, no hay pan duro.

translation.en: - Did you get it? - Yes, every goddamn thing.
- See? -
Thank you!
Listen. I know it's none of my business.
translation.es: Oigan, sé que no es asunto mío,

translation.en: But, you know, I'm fond of this one. So I got to tell you guys that your plan--
translation.es: pero él me cae bien, así que debo decirles que su plan…

translation.en: Is none of your business.
Relax, big guy.
- - We're on the same team.
There is no way you're getting that hardware into the Vie Hotel.
translation.es: No hay forma de que entren con eso al hotel Vie.

translation.en: It's locked down tight, and the only way in is through the front.
translation.es: Está supervigilado, y la única entrada es la principal.

translation.en: I don't like this. We need to rethink it.
translation.es: No me gusta esto. Debemos pensar.

translation.en: All right. I'll take care of it.
No. Tomorrow, we're all going. We're gonna get Jenny's killer together.
translation.es: No, atraparemos a la asesina de Jenny juntos.

translation.en: Hey! Yo!
Jen's dead?
Uh, yeah. Our target took her out.
Now it's our turn.
Shit.
I'm so sorry.
I can help you get in.
It's dangerous.
I know.
Security there is tight. We can use that to our advantage.
translation.es: Hay mucha seguridad, pero podemos aprovechar eso.

translation.en: We?
Morning, boys.
Hey. Thanks.
Is this your idea of a joke?
Trust me.
This is 007 shit.
translation.es: Esta mierda es como de James Bond.

translation.en: We're good.
Okay. Be careful with these.
Wow. What's so special about them?
- Magic. - Come on. Let's go.
We're gonna get justice for her.
What do you think?
You don't want to know, Lu.
Then we're thinking the same thing.
Come on.
Okay. Whoa, whoa! What did we do? We didn't do anything!
Goddamn!
A bit much, isn't it?
Are you guys seeing this?
Looks like a dipshit nobody.
Ah.
Get up.
- All right. Easy. Easy. - Can I talk to your manager?
Hey, we're just on holiday.
- - We're valued customers.
One- star Yelp review on the way!
Agent Zulu.
Let the hotel security handle that. You just focus on…
translation.es: Que la seguridad del hotel se encargue. Tú concéntrate en…

translation.en: Why are you here?
You're wasting your time.
It's for Songkran, the Thai water festival.
translation.es: Es para el Songkran, el festival tailandés del agua.

translation.en: That's not until April.
Yeah. Well, we like to be prepared.
Now you're gonna have to reorganize her bag.
You for real?  Yes, I'm for real.
- Bullshit! - Look at all this mess.
Stay here.
What's going on?
Where is our fucking visual?
- I'm working on it. - Our gear is still working.
Whatever is happening is only affecting the hotel.
translation.es: Es algo que solo afecta al hotel.

translation.en: Something is going down.
This is not good.
- - Zulu! Zulu!
You are my men now.
- Close your eyes. - What?
Just close your eyes.
- Trust me. - Come on!
Come on. Let's get out of here.
- - See you in a second.
Stop!
- Good timing. - Yeah. Of course it is.
Ah, fuck. Who the fuck did this?
- Hands where I can see 'em. -
Zama?
Lu.
What are you doing here?
- You know her? - Yeah, we met in London.
I was pushing some Aston Martins, and my broker turned out to be Interpol's finest.
translation.es: Vendía unos Aston Martin, y mi corredor resultó ser Interpol.

translation.en: - Look, hey, these bodies-- - Get down on your knees!
This wasn't us. So you just tripped and fell into a massacre?
translation.es: - No fuimos nosotros. - ¿Esta masacre es casualidad?

translation.en: Zama, you know me. You think I would do this?
translation.es: Zama, me conoces. ¿Crees que haría esto?

translation.en: There's a lot I don't know about you, Lu.
translation.es: Hay mucho que no sé de ti.

translation.en: This is bigger and more complicated than you can imagine.
translation.es: Esto es más complicado de lo que imaginas.

translation.en: Try me. The fate of the world.
- I didn't come to fuck around. - Don't!
Agent Boucher. I have two suspects. I need backup.
translation.es: Agente Boucher, tengo a dos sospechosos. Necesito refuerzos.

translation.en: Boucher?
Whoever got them probably got your team.
translation.es: Quien los haya matado, también mató a tu equipo.

translation.en: Interlace your fingers behind your head, - and get down on the floor. -
translation.es: Coloca las manos detrás de la cabeza y tírate al suelo.

translation.en: - I don't want to hurt you. - Kai. Don't.
Listen to your friend. He seems to be the reasonable one.
translation.es: Escucha a tu amigo. Parece razonable.

translation.en: First time I've heard that. Lower your gun.
translation.es: Eres la primera que opina eso. Baja el arma.

translation.en: - What the fuck happened here? - We're working on it.
Let her go. She's not the threat. Please.
translation.es: Déjala. Ella no es la amenaza.

translation.en: Look, it's clear that none of us are the bad guys.
translation.es: Miren, está claro que nosotros no somos los malos.

translation.en: But they are coming.
Who's coming? The entire hotel.
On your six!
- I got it. - I'm just looking out for you.
- Because that's always been your MO. - Here we go again.
translation.es: - Esa es tu excusa. - Ya empezamos…

translation.en: You could just say sorry.
- What?  - Sorry works just fine.
Did you guys, like, used to date or--
- No! - No!
Zan.
Assassin.
Why are you here?
They offered me a deal.
The Wu Assassin in exchange for power.
translation.es: El asesino del Wu a cambio de poder.

translation.en: Where we going?
- Fuck. Come with me - Go!
Shit!
Fuck! Get in the car!
Looks like you're not the only special one.
Look out!
Hey. Hey, hey, take it easy.
Fuck.
It's locked!
Go!
Door says push, not pull.
What?
Hold up. Where's Kai?
Don't worry about Kai, all right?
Oh shit. You okay?
Yo, you good?
Zan?
- Yo, we gotta go. Come on. - My van's still here. Come on!
translation.es: - Debemos irnos. - A mi camioneta. Vamos.

translation.en: Get in.
- What happened back there? - What happened in here?
This is chaotic.
You know what to do.
If only you would've listened to me when I told you something's sketchy.
translation.es: Debiste oírme cuando te dije que algo parecía raro.

translation.en: We didn't have another lead.
Take them down.
Get me out of here now.
- Shit. - What?
In case you thought we lost 'em, we didn't.
translation.es: Si creyeron que los perdimos, no es así.

translation.en: - Hold tight. -
Can you get to Khaosan Road?
- We have another safe house there. - Yeah.
Shit.
It's the end of the road.
Shit.
Get out of the car!
- She's locking down the city. - What are we gonna do?
Sail away.
I'm really starting to strongly dislike you.
translation.es: Ya no me caes muy bien.

translation.en: We get to the canal. Take a boat up the Chao Phraya.
translation.es: Vayamos al canal. Tomemos un bote a Chao Phraya.

translation.en: That plan is just--
Stop firing.
Get them out of the car. Bring them to me.
I changed my mind. I like the plan.
translation.es: Cambié de opinión, me gusta el plan.

translation.en: Yeah. River, boat.
- If you wanna join me, guns are up top. - Come on.
translation.es: Si quieren ayudar, arriba hay armas. Andando.

translation.en: Shoot it! Let's get these fuckers!
Ah, fuck. I'm all out.
They're trying to burn us alive. We gotta go!
translation.es: Nos quieren quemar vivos. Debemos irnos.

translation.en: Okay. Everybody, follow me.
So I, I only spit fire and dope So later on you can go quote
Yo, what's up?
- Never lose sight, I'm true dude - Good timing.
Never seen that before.
I picked up a few things since you ghosted me.
translation.es: Aprendí mucho desde que me dejaste.

translation.en: Yeah. Well, if I'd have stayed, it would've been behind bars, wouldn't it?
translation.es: Si me hubiera quedado, estaría en la cárcel, ¿no?

translation.en: This way. The river.
Get out the way!
Get to the boat!
Get out the way!
Get off my boat!
Kai! Look out!
- Go, go! -
- Get us out of here! - Come on!
Hurry, they're catching up!
Get out of the way! Get out of the way!
We're almost there. It's just up ahead.
translation.es: Casi llegamos. Hay que seguir derecho.

translation.en: Ah, Preeya!
You are back.
I didn't know if we'd ever see you.
translation.es: No sabía que volvería a verte.

translation.en: Everyone's excited to see you.
So this is your home.
- It's been a while since I was last here. - What about your family?
translation.es: - Hace mucho que no vengo. - ¿Y tu familia?

translation.en: They were long gone before that.
What's this?
Magical protection.
If they don't want you, you can't pass.
translation.es: Si ellos no quieren, no puedes pasar.

translation.en: I guess they want us in.
This is the home of a shaman.
He knows everything about the supernatural.
If anyone might know what's going on, it's Chatree.
translation.es: Si alguien sabe qué está pasando, es Chatree.

translation.en: You used to call me a charlatan, didn't you?
translation.es: Antes decías que era un fraude, ¿o no?

translation.en: Uncle!
It's nice to meet everyone.
You all must be starving.
- 100% - How'd you know?
Usually, I am the one showing hospitality.
translation.es: En general, yo soy el anfitrión.

translation.en: You are.
It is my honor to have such an esteemed guest.
translation.es: Es un honor tener un huésped tan distinguido.

translation.en: What do you know about Pan Gu?
In Thailand, we don't talk business on an empty stomach.
translation.es: En Tailandia, no hablamos de negocios con el estómago vacío.

translation.en: Is that a saying?
One that I just made up.
There are people after us.
There will always be people after you.
Here we are well- protected.
We have weapons.
Is this a prank?
No.
But it is funny that this bracelet is yours.
translation.es: Pero es gracioso que este brazalete sea tuyo,

translation.en: But it is not for you.
You speak like Yoda, old man.
Baby Yoda.
I am only 50.
Pan Gu.
Uncle.
William Pan, he wasn't, uh, completely honest with you.
translation.es: William Pan no fue del todo sincero.

translation.en: Yeah? No shit.
Pan and Ku An Qi are opposite forces.
translation.es: Pan y Ku An Qi son fuerzas opuestas.

translation.en: Yin
and yang.
But they are not in opposition to each other.
They are two halves of a whole.
translation.es: Son las dos mitades de un todo.

translation.en: They have been working in harmony
through all their births, lives, deaths, rebirths
translation.es: a lo largo de sus nacimientos, vidas, muertes y renacimientos

translation.en: towards one goal,
reforming back to Pan Gu,
the first man.
And using their power, they will remake the world in their image.
translation.es: Y, con ese poder, reharán el mundo a su imagen.

translation.en: And now that the Dao is broken,
translation.es: Y ahora que el Dao se ha roto,

translation.en: they have the opportunity.
How will they do that?
By harnessing the Chi of the one who split them.
translation.es: Aprovechando el qí de quien los separó.

translation.en: The Wu Assassin.
The two of them each have a piece of their old Essence.
translation.es: Cada uno tiene una pieza de su antigua esencia,

translation.en: The only constant they have,
translation.es: la única constante en sus vidas,

translation.en: forged from the stone of the temple where they were split.
translation.es: que se forjó en el templo donde los separaron.

translation.en: If they can infuse the pieces with Kai's Chi,
translation.es: Si pueden infundir el qí de Kai en esas piezas,

translation.en: they will be able to connect the halves.
Does it look something like this?
Where did you get that from?
I mean, it doesn't matter.
If it's part of Ku, we'll just destroy it--
translation.es: Si es parte de Ku, lo destruiremos.

translation.en: - - It can't be destroyed!
I've had quite enough, thank you.
This… This whole thing is just crazy.
- - You okay?
I'm just trying to wrap my head around
this supernatural shit and the world ending.
translation.es: toda esta mierda sobrenatural y el fin del mundo.

translation.en: Yeah.
What did you do when you first found out?
I had just shot a Russian gangster in the face.
translation.es: Acababa de dispararle a un mafioso ruso en la cara.

translation.en: So you could say it was a little bit weird.
translation.es: Así que fue un poco raro.

translation.en: Honestly?
I poured myself a big fucking drink.
- - Ugh. This is terrible.
Can't be worse than that Chinese whiskey we had in Brick Lane.
translation.es: No es peor que el whisky chino que bebimos en Brick Lane.

translation.en: Yeah. Well, that was… that was part of a job, so…
translation.es: Sí. Eso era parte de una misión, así que…

translation.en: - - Is that what I was to you?
Just part of the job.
I can taste when you're lying.
Training?
Meditation.
My meditation is meditation.
- You're not worried about us losing? - No, I'm not.
translation.es: - ¿No le preocupa que perdamos? - Para nada.

translation.en: Because if that should happen, Pan Gu would remake the world,
translation.es: Si eso pasara, Pan Gu reharía el mundo

translation.en: and we would simply be the forgotten dreams of a butterfly.
translation.es: y solo seríamos los sueños olvidados de una mariposa.

translation.en: Sounds peaceful.
But that is the one thing
that the Wu Assassin can never have.
translation.es: que el asesino del Wu nunca tendrá.

translation.en: He may have friends that he's shutting out.
translation.es: Tiene amigos a los que aleja.

translation.en: It's my responsibility to protect them.
You have lost one.
And now you're trying everything to avoid that pain again.
translation.es: Y ahora intentas todo para no volver a sentir ese dolor.

translation.en: They're all I have left.
But Pan Gu seeks to control all.
translation.es: Pero Pan Gu parece controlarlo todo.

translation.en: What do you want, Wu Assassin?
We'll stop him.
We'll stop him. We'll make plans.
There's a Jeep there.
There is the path that leads to the main road.
translation.es: Y allí está el camino que lleva a la autopista.

translation.en: From there, it's an easy ride to wherever.
translation.es: Desde ahí, puedes ir a cualquier lado.

translation.en: You did not come here to train
or reflect.
You came here to leave
after everyone went to bed.
translation.es: cuando todos se fueran a dormir.

translation.en: Last time I was here was, um…
translation.es: La última vez que estuve aquí…

translation.en: ten years ago.
Family had a farm by the river.
translation.es: Mi familia tenía una granja junto al río.

translation.en: There was a bad flood.
Water came suddenly, and just like that…
translation.es: El agua llegó de pronto, y así como así…

translation.en: my mum, my dad,
and my sister were gone.
No magical attack.
No clash for the world. It was, uh,
translation.es: No lucharon por defender al mundo…

translation.en: just an accident.
There's nothing I can do to bring my family back,
translation.es: No puedo hacer nada para recuperar a mi familia,

translation.en: but I thought I could bring you some peace for Jen.
translation.es: pero creí que podría ayudarte a darle paz a Jen.

translation.en: And that is why I'm helping.
At least there's something you can do.
You have Kai,
Lu Xin.
Me…
I'm all alone.
I'm sorry.
I didn't know.
Well, you never asked.
This can't be real.
It isn't.
It's the version of the village in your mind
translation.es: Es la versión de la aldea que tienes en tu mente

translation.en: from when you were a child.
But we can make it like this again.
We can make it into whatever we want.
Pan Gu is all.
Mum, Dad, Ratana!
- - I miss you.
You can be together again… - - …forever.
All we need is one small thing.
The Wu Assassin's Chi.
translation.es: El qí del asesino del Wu.

translation.en: It'll be easy.
- What are you doing? - I had no choice.
- What did they promise you? -
Get up.
What's going on?
What do you think?
I fuck with these.
- There's more down there. Let's go. - Yo! Tommy, hold up!
translation.es: - Hay más ahí abajo. Vamos. - ¡Tommy, espera!

translation.en: I'll get Preeya.
- What? - Be careful, okay?
I am getting really, really sick of this shit.
translation.es: Ya estoy harto de toda esta mierda.

translation.en: Tommy, get the Jeep.
We'll hold them off while Zama and Preeya get here. Preeya betrayed us.
translation.es: - ¿Y Zama y Preeya? - Preeya nos traicionó.

translation.en: - No. She wouldn't. - What? She took Ku An Qi's necklace.
translation.es: - Jamás lo haría. - Tomó el collar de Ku An Qi.

translation.en: - Fuck. - Lu, get Zama. Tommy, the car!
translation.es: - Mierda. - Lu, trae a Zama. Tommy, el auto.

translation.en: - Hold on. We're stronger together. - Just do as I say!
Shit.
Oh shit.
Zama.
Preeya betrayed us. We gotta go now.
I know. I saw her leave with Pan's men. Let's go.
translation.es: Lo sé. La vi irse con los hombres de Pan.

translation.en: Calm down, boys.
All right. Let's go, guys!
Come on, let's go.
Come on, everybody in.
You can no longer be stopped.
It's in your hands now. Go!
Don't let Pan Gu reform!
- No! Chatree! - Get in the car!
- We need to go! - Drive, Tommy!
We shouldn't have left Chatree.
- Should have listened to me. - There wasn't anything to listen to.
translation.es: - Debieron escucharme. - No había nada que escuchar.

translation.en: - I made a decision. - Yeah. Nothing new there, Kai.
translation.es: - Tomé una decisión. - Sí, como siempre, Kai.

translation.en: - I'm leading us. - No, you're not. You're shutting us out.
translation.es: - Los estoy guiando. - No. Nos haces a un lado.

translation.en: Guys, let's focus on what the fuck we're gonna do now.
I'm sorry. You have no right to say shit.
translation.es: Perdona, pero no tienes derecho a decir nada.

translation.en: - What the fuck you talking about? - What do you mean?
translation.es: - ¿De qué mierda hablas? - ¿Cómo que de qué?

translation.en: Your little girlfriend that you brought into our inner circle betrayed us.
translation.es: Tu noviecita fue la que nos traicionó.

translation.en: You gonna put that on me?
Sure, you weren't on the lookout either. You were occupied fucking Zama.
translation.es: Tú tampoco estabas atento. Estabas ocupado con Zama.

translation.en: And, Kai, like, what the fuck? What were you doing? What was your plan?
translation.es: Y Kai, ¿qué mierda pensabas? ¿Cuál era tu plan?

translation.en: My plan was to kill Pan and Ku myself.
translation.es: Matar a Pan y a Ku yo solo.

translation.en: - Like I should have done. - Yeah? Great, 'cause you're always right.
translation.es: - Como debí haber hecho. - Genial, porque siempre tienes razón.

translation.en: We don't need you. I don't need any of you. True! I'm going myself.
translation.es: - Sí. No los necesito. - Bien. ¡Es cierto! Me voy solo.

translation.en: - Get the fuck out of here! - Just stop it!
All of you. You're acting like little children.
Do I need to remind you
that we need to stop a god from destroying reality?
translation.es: que tenemos que evitar que un dios destruya nuestra realidad?

translation.en: You say you're a family.
You're not acting like a family,
not one that's about to save the world.
translation.es: Es imposible que salven el mundo

translation.en: Because you cannot even take care of each other.
translation.es: porque no se pueden ni cuidar entre ustedes.

translation.en: If you can…
just get over your anger…
your guilt…
Your ego.
We might actually have a chance. We really might.
translation.es: quizá tengamos una oportunidad. En serio.

translation.en: So, let's remind ourselves.
Why are we here?
For Jenny.
She's right.
We're all fucking idiots.
No, no, no, no. No.
I'm the idiot.
I'm a fucking idiot.
For Jenny.
- For Jenny. - For Jenny.
Now we're getting somewhere.
When we were at Pan's temple,
translation.es: Cuando fuimos al templo de Pan, vi ese símbolo

translation.en: I saw that splitting symbol in a photo of a factory at another dig site.
translation.es: Cuando fuimos al templo de Pan, vi ese símbolo en una foto de otra fábrica.

translation.en: That's where the stone came from, so we gotta go to that dig site.
translation.es: De allí vino la piedra, así que debemos ir.

translation.en: But they only have half of the symbol completed, so, like,
translation.es: Pero solo la mitad del símbolo estaba completa,

translation.en: they're gonna need your power.
No. We shouldn't risk it.
No, no. We should. We should.
Because they'll come after all of us if we don't stop them.
translation.es: Vendrán a buscarnos a todos si no los detenemos.

translation.en: This ends tonight.
If you all agree.
As long as we're smart about it.
You can count me in.
- We are all the Wu Assassins. -
Shit.
- Let's go kill a god. - Let's do it.
There are a lot of guards here.
They'll know we're coming.
They already know I'm here.
In that case…
This is where the first Wu Assassin tore us apart.
translation.es: Aquí es donde el primer asesino del Wu nos dividió.

translation.en: They'll be here soon.
This Wu Assassin is particularly hard to kill.
translation.es: Este asesino del Wu es muy difícil de matar.

translation.en: I got this.
This thing killed my uncle.
How many more people have to die before I get my family back?
translation.es: ¿Cuántos más morirán hasta que recupere a mi familia?

translation.en: Your problem, child, is that you see death as the end.
translation.es: Tu problema, niña, es que piensas que la muerte es el final.

translation.en: - You'll be with them soon enough. -
Along with all living things.
That's where the stone is melted. Those are the sleeping quarters.
translation.es: Ahí se derrite el mineral. Esas son las habitaciones.

translation.en: - Those are the main pressing machines. - How do you know?
translation.es: - Esas son las prensas. - ¿Cómo sabes eso?

translation.en: Wikipedia.
We gotta be careful. They still need you for the ritual, so…
translation.es: Tengamos cuidado. Te necesitan para el ritual, así que…

translation.en: Get down! Move!
Zan.
- What do you want to do? - We're splitting up.
Yeah. We're not divided. We're dividing them.
translation.es: Sí. No nos separamos, es para separarlos a ellos.

translation.en: I got Zan. Lu, the Beast.
translation.es: Me encargo de Zan. Lu, tú de La bestia.

translation.en: You guys find Pan and Ku.
- - Fuck!
Try this. It's got good range.
- Be careful. - Okay.
Zan!
Let's finish this.
I promised myself
translation.es: Me prometí que eliminaría todo lo relacionado

translation.en: I'd erase anything related to when I was a pawn of your father's.
translation.es: Me prometí que eliminaría todo lo relacionado al tiempo que pasé con tu padre. Comenzamos con Jenny.

translation.en: We started with Jenny.
translation.es: al tiempo que pasé con tu padre. Comenzamos con Jenny.

translation.en: And it ends when I kill you, Assassin.
translation.es: Y terminará cuando te mate, asesino.

translation.en: You're not the one I'm looking for.
Well, we are who you've got, bitch.
translation.es: Bueno, pero somos todo lo que obtendrás, perra.

translation.en: The necklace isn't here. None of this matters if we can't find it.
translation.es: No tiene el collar. Nada de esto importa si no lo hallamos.

translation.en: They're not fools, Tommy. Let's go find the others.
translation.es: No son tontos, Tommy. Busquemos a los demás.

translation.en: You fucking piece of shit.
- The fuck were you thinking? - Wait. No. Stop.
Tell me they mind- controlled you.
They told me I could see my family again,
translation.es: Dijeron que volvería a ver a mi familia, y cometí un error.

translation.en: and I made a mistake, and I'm so sorry. So sorry!
translation.es: Dijeron que volvería a ver a mi familia, y cometí un error. Lo siento mucho.

translation.en: I messed up.
It's okay. It's okay.
Mastery over the body has its perks.
translation.es: Esta es la ventaja de controlar el mundo físico.

translation.en: Fucking magic.
- Give up. - Never.
Get up!
This isn't for me.
This is for all of us.
Welcome.
- Lu Xin! - He'll be fine.
Your friends took out Ku.
But you
will not be so lucky.
I am Pan Gu, the first man.
translation.es: Soy Pan Gu, el primer hombre.

translation.en: Control of mind, body, and soul.
translation.es: Controlo la mente, el cuerpo y el espíritu.

translation.en: Lu. Lu, wait. Hey.
Brother. It's not you!
- Pan Gu! - Kai.
- What the fuck? -
The trouble is, you are but one man,
translation.es: El problema es que tú eres solo un hombre,

translation.en: while I am all.
translation.es: pero yo soy todos los hombres.

translation.en: Brother, I don't want to do this.
Thank you for your sacrifice.
No. No!
Lu! Lu! Lu!
Fight it.
We can't do this without you.
Fight it, brother! Wake up!
Come on, Lu! Get up!
We need you, brother!
Tommy.
- Come on. You can do it. - Fucking bitch.
translation.es: - Vamos, tú puedes. - Perra de mierda.

translation.en: I think we've got bigger problems. Let's go.
Let's go.
What the fuck happened? Is that you? Hey.
Of course, it's fucking me. Who else would it be?
translation.es: Claro que soy yo, carajo. ¿Quién más sería?

translation.en: Nice.
Let's kill this motherfucker.
translation.es: Matemos a ese hijo de puta.

translation.en: Oh, fuck, yeah.
- - Lu!
- Kai! - Lu, what's going on?
- Ah, Lu! Ah! - It's sinking!
Grab that.
Kai! Heads up!
- I can't hold. - Hold on. Hold on, Kai!
Lu!
Stay there. Zama!
- Yeah? - Follow me.
Tie that!
Gotcha.
- This is serious, man. - No shit!
- You guys know knots? - We're about to find out.
Girl Scout those ropes together.
We'll bring 'em up with up this. Let me know when there's enough rope.
translation.es: Los subiremos con esto. Avísame cuando alcance la cuerda.

translation.en: Kai, this isn't working.
Come up with something. You're the Wu Assassin.
translation.es: Haz algo. Eres el asesino del Wu.

translation.en: Come on! Grab it! Grab it!
- Zama? - Almost there.
Let me know when you guys are good.
Start pulling!
Ah! It's about time.
All right, guys. I need help. Come on! Come on!
Come on, Zama.
Keep going! Keep going! Keep going!
It's over.
I know a really nice, safe passage out. Come on.
translation.es: Conozco una forma segura de salir. Vamos.

translation.en: Food's ready, guys.
Looks good.
Hold it, man. First, a toast.
translation.es: Esperen. Un brindis. Un brindis por la familia, la de siempre y la nueva.

translation.en: To family. New and old.
translation.es: Un brindis por la familia, la de siempre y la nueva.

translation.en: To family. Cheers!
To Jenny.
To Jenny.
So, Kai, what's next?
- I'm off to fight a necromancer. - Ooh!
I guess we're going on vacation then.
- We? I thought you could handle yourself. - What do you mean?
Oh wow. Here we go with the talk.
Look, look, look, just 'cause I kicked your ass,
translation.es: Oye, solo porque te pateé el trasero…

translation.en: all of us saw it, but we don't have to talk about it.
translation.es: Todos los vieron, no hace falta decirlo.

translation.en: - You wanna spar? You wanna try me? - Do I want to spar?
I don't got to prove anything to you!
You're the Wu Assassin. I'm just the Lu Assassin.
translation.es: Eres el asesino del Wu, yo soy el asesino de Lu.

translation.en: - You gonna let him say that? - Oh!
Okay. Okay.
- Oh my God. That's crazy. - Guys, guys, guys.
translation.es: - Dios mío. - Yo también puedo. - Chicos. - Es fácil.

translation.en: - Let's get him! - Ah!
- Whoa, whoa, whoa! - He's going in. Get him in the water.
